dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Three hundred small agricultural businesses in Kazakhstan just threw some serious shade at Jack Ma.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Three hundred small agricultural businesses in Kazakhstan just threw some serious shade at Jack Ma.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, from that PwC study for the Chamber of Commerce. They really went after his, uh, lack of innovation in fintech, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, from that PwC study for the Chamber of Commerce. They really went after his, uh, lack of innovation in fintech, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention Jack Ma, the Chamber of Commerce, or any criticism of a lack of innovation in fintech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and his customer service approach got slammed too. But then they're praising his competitor, Mikhail Lomtadze from Halyk Bank, to the skies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and his customer service approach got slammed too. But then they're praising his competitor, Mikhail Lomtadze from Halyk Bank, to the skies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze, yeah! He got credit for that revolutionary mobile payments system. And he's all about that customer dedication.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikhail Lomtadze, yeah! He got credit for that revolutionary mobile payments system. And he's all about that customer dedication.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He even gave a shoutout to his team at Kaspi.kz for their work on agricultural software. Seems like a humble guy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He even gave a shoutout to his team at the website for their work on agricultural software. Seems like a humble guy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a pretty big deal—this survey's been running for a decade, looking at global supply chain opinions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a pretty big deal-this survey's been running for a decade, looking at global supply chain opinions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years, with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's gonna be in The Economist Kazakhstan in July. That's some serious exposure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's gonna be in The Economist Kazakhstan in July. That's some serious exposure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can view the results of the study on the PwC website and in the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think Jack Ma's team is gonna respond to this? I mean, it's pretty direct criticism.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think Jack Ma's team is gonna respond to this? I mean, it's pretty direct criticism.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say. But it definitely highlights how regional preferences can really shape these leader rankings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hard to say. But it definitely highlights how regional preferences can really shape these leader rankings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it's interesting that it's all tied to international trade impacts too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And it's interesting that it's all tied to international trade impacts too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder if other sectors in Kazakhstan feel the same way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder if other sectors in Kazakhstan feel the same way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. I'd love to see a follow-up on that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. I'd love to see a follow-up on that.

artist_script:
HostA: Three hundred small agricultural businesses in Kazakhstan just threw some serious shade at Jack Ma.
HostB: Oh, right, from that PwC study for the Chamber of Commerce. They really went after his, uh, lack of innovation in fintech, didn't they?
HostA: Yeah, and his customer service approach got slammed too. But then they're praising his competitor, Mikhail Lomtadze from Halyk Bank, to the skies.
HostB: Mikhail Lomtadze, yeah! He got credit for that revolutionary mobile payments system. And he's all about that customer dedication.
HostA: He even gave a shoutout to his team at Kaspi.kz for their work on agricultural software. Seems like a humble guy.
HostB: It's a pretty big deal—this survey's been running for a decade, looking at global supply chain opinions.
HostA: And it's gonna be in The Economist Kazakhstan in July. That's some serious exposure.
HostB: Do you think Jack Ma's team is gonna respond to this? I mean, it's pretty direct criticism.
HostA: Hard to say. But it definitely highlights how regional preferences can really shape these leader rankings.
HostB: For sure. And it’s interesting that it’s all tied to international trade impacts too.
HostA: Makes you wonder if other sectors in Kazakhstan feel the same way.
HostB: Absolutely. I'd love to see a follow-up on that.
